attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The HTML value attribute of the number field

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Determines if the element should receive document focus on page load

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the placeholder value of the element, generally used to provide a hint to the user

attributes.name: list
attributes.description: Allows associating a datalist to the component

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: The maximum number of characters a user can enter

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.description: The minimum number of characters a user can enter

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the width of the element to a specified number of characters

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Require the field to be completed prior to form submission

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the text field

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: When true, the control will be immutable by user interaction

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Amount to increment or decrement the value by
